name: Gertie Goose
storyline:
Enter a world of 3D fantasy filled with excitement and fun. Gertie Goose has been robbed of her eggs, somewhere in the hidden forest are the keys to the Inner Sanctums where the Demon King has hidden Gertie's eggs, he has placed his soldiers to guard them to prevent Gertie from rescuing them.
Your task is to guide Gertie around the forest to find the keys to the Inner Sanctums, to fight off the soldier guarding the forest and the eggs and then to collect all the lost eggs and finally defeat the Demon King, but beware, if you are caught it could be the end for Gertie!! Use the Help Screens for advice, alter the difficulty levels if you dare!
summary:
You are in control of GERTIE GOOSE.

• FOREST DEMONS have stolen your 8 eggs.

• Search the hidden forest locations for your lost eggs.

• Beat the MASTER DEMON by collecting most of your lost eggs.
